data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Temporary booking page that expires after meeting". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.

data.instruction: Create a booking order using the published offer version with realistic times and monetary totals.

data.expectedResult: Customer session established and offer discovery succeeds.
